abstract: Football Roundup; NFL players' union releases transcript of New England Patriots quarterback Tom Brady testifying that he had nothing to do with underinflation of footballs before AFC championship game against Indianapolis Colts in January; other NFL news noted.
lead_paragraph: In a transcript released in a filing by the N.F.L. players’ union, Brady maintained his innocence in the case involving deflated footballs.

headline.main: Patriots’ Tom Brady Denies Tampering in Released Testimony
headline.print_headline: In Released Testimony, Brady Denies Any Tampering

snippet: In a transcript released in a filing by the N.F.L. players’ union, Brady maintained his innocence in the case involving deflated footballs.
